蔢字的基本解释

蔢
pó
〔蔢??（
su?）〕a.草木茂盛；b.草根。

蔢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pó］
［《廣韻》薄波切，平戈，並。］
见“蔢莎”。
[②]［bò］
［《集韻》步卧切，去過，並。］
薄荷。

蔢字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蔢； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1055第05
【唐韻】薄彼切，音婆。蔢蔢，草木盛貌。　又【集韻】步臥切，音?。【玉篇】蔢?，藥名。○按薄荷，見《本草綱目》。詳荷字註。其薄字或作菝，或作番，或作蔢，或作?，皆方書傳寫之譌，不必拘泥也。

蔢字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蔢字的起名意思

意为草木茂盛。

Ling
Basic explanation of words
Ling
pó
〔蔢?? (
su?)] a. lush vegetation; b. grass roots.
Ling
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pó］
["Guang Yun" Bo Boche, Ping Ge, and. ]
See "Linsha".
[②]［bò］
["Ji Yun" step by step, have been there, and. ]
mint.
Ling
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Characters] 　蔢; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1055 05
[Tang Yun] Thin Biqie, Yin Po. Lin Lin, beautiful vegetation.　[Jiyun] step by step, cut, sound?. [Jade articles] Lin?, the name of the medicine. ○Press mint, see "Compendium of Materia Medica". Detailed lotus notes. The thin characters are either smilax, or fan, or 蔢, or ?, all of which are written in the Fangshu, so there is no need to stick to it.
